Vrock.explanation: The Khargi is a huge fiend with flying ability and poison-themed swarm attacks, similar in concept to the Vrock's fiendish nature and aerial combat.

Swarm of Poisonous Snakes.explanation: The Khargi's ability to summon swarms of poisonous insects and deal poison damage aligns mechanically with the swarm nature and poison damage of the Swarm of Poisonous Snakes.
